charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] had come to town 
to do some shopping.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1101_0200_20:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] turned the corner onto a big street to get 
to the shop [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] was heading for.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_0400_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Don’t jump out at people like that!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_0500_10: You bumped into me, so I’m fining you a million!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0401_0700_10: Really?! Hey, I’m serious about this!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0402_0900_10:
What’s that all about?!
You can’t just refuse like that!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1000_10:
You’re the one who bumped into me, so
of course you have to pay a fine...right?
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1100_10:
You know, I kind of get the feeling that maybe 
it was I who bumped into you. Hmmm...
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1200_10:
I guess it can’t be helped! No fine 
for you this time! I mean, that’s how 
it always ends up, anyway.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1300_10:
I’m so disappointed. I finally had a chance to get
you to pay me a fine.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1400_10: I’ll never reach my goal at this rate.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0401_1600_10: Hehehe! Don’t act too shocked when I tell you!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0302_1700_10: There’s a purpose to your fines?
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1900_10:
My goal is to use the fines I collect to build my
own Battle Tower!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_2000_10:
The Battle Tower is a place to have Pokémon
battles. My daddy—
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_2100_10:
I mean, my DAD faces off against challengers
who climb the Battle Tower.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_2200_10:
I’ve made many attempts myself, but it always
ended in defeat for me.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_2300_10:
But someday, I’ll make my dad take on the
Battle Tower that I build!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_2400_10:
And I will definitely beat him!
That’s one of my dreams!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0401_2600_10:
Right? You’ve gotta dream big if you wanna
have fun!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0401_2700_10: That’s not my only dream, though.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0402_2900_10: Yup, and this next one’s a doozy of a dream!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_3100_10:
My master, Mr. Wake—pro wrestler Crasher
Wake—doesn’t acknowledge my skills at all!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_3200_10: I’ve devised a special plan just for him!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_3300_10:
Mr. Wake’s Floatzel and my Piplup are both
Pokémon that use Water-type moves.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_3400_10:
I’m going to make my Piplup learn more
awesome moves than his Floatzel to surprise him!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0401_3600_10:
It’s good to have dreams, but when 
you have too many, you might not be able
to make any of them come true.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0402_3800_10:
It’s good to have dreams, but when 
you have too many, you might not be able
to make any of them come true.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_3900_10: Which one do you think I should go for first?
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_4000_10:
You have to decide right now!
Ready? Three, two, one...
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_4100_10:
Oh, never mind! This is exactly the kind of
thing that I need to take the time to think
about for myself.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_4200_10: Hehehe! I told you my dreams.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_4300_10: So you have to tell me yours!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_4400_10: If you don’t tell, I’m fining you!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_1201_0100_10: Excuse me, young lady! Come battle my Piplup!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_1201_0200_10: Who, me? Of course. I’ll be your opponent.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_1201_0300_10:
Hehe! All right! My Piplup is raring to go!
Time for a Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0101_0100_10:
I’m not sure how well I’ll battle,
but I’ll give my absolute best!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0501_0100_10:
What a strong Piplup you have! I couldn’t help
myself from being impressed.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0501_0200_10:
Right?! I knew it!
My synergy with Piplup is perfect!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0501_0300_10:
Huh? What’s happening to Piplup?
Could this be Evolution?
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0501_0400_10:
Piplup, are you evolving?!
I told you he was raring to go!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0501_0500_10:
All right! We’re going to get stronger and
stronger until we’re the strongest Pokémon
and Trainer in the world!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_1201_0100_10:
I’m still not saying you can be my apprentice,
but you’re certainly growing! 
I’ve had my eye on you.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_1201_0200_10:
Thanks for watching, Master! Ooh, my master
finally acknowledged my skills!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_1201_0300_10:
I just said I’m not your master! You’re still far
too soft to be my apprentice! You can still
get stronger!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0101_0100_10:
First, you have to show me your skills.
Then we can talk!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0501_0100_10:
Barry and Prinplup, you gave me a good 
match! You look happy about it, don’t you?
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0501_0200_10:
Master...I’m so moved! I can really feel that
Prinplup and I have gotten stronger.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0501_0300_10:
The way you battled, I almost thought you were
your father!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0501_0400_10:
We did it, Prinplup! It’s all thanks to
y— Wait, what’s happening?!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0501_0500_10:
What’s that all about?! If you’re going to evolve,
at least say something!
